➤ Nov 2022 - Jan 2023

FAAS dashboard - UBO

2

UBO is a product platform that combines all products of company at 1 website. In facts, GeoTech has various product and each product have different technical used so UBO

platform should cover that by uses micro-frontend for handle routing multiple project. In another hand, to good manage multiple projects in 1 website, UBO is using monorepos architecture that combines all repositories in one git.

FAAS is a part in UBO platform. FAAS will integrate with UBO platform as a Reactjs project.

FAAS leverages UBO’Okta UAM to SSO and also handling authentication/authorization for FAAS dashboard.

Responsibilities:

● Discuss take requirement of FAAS dashboard that integrates with UBO. ● Research Okta UAM and also the way UBO working with it.

● Coding FAAS integrates with UBO.

● Write UT and e2e test.

● Deep working with micro-frontend and monorepos architecture.

Technologies used in project:

● Single-spa, reactjs

● Turborepos for monorepos architecture.

● Playwright, jest

● Okta UAM

● Redux-saga.

● Golang

● Druid

● Neo4j

Achievements:

● The monorepos architecture

● The micro frontend

● Testing e2e
